name: BattleTanx: Global Assault
description: BattleTanx: Global Assault is an action game developed and published by The 3DO Company for the Nintendo 64 and PlayStation, in which players control futuristic tanks in a post-apocalyptic scenario. It is a sequel to the Nintendo 64 game BattleTanx, which utilized the same method of game play. Despite receiving relatively positive reviews from critics, 3DO went bankrupt before another sequel could be released.
